entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
